name: cc-mt-service
description: 1. Make sure you are in cc_materiaalitori_service_setup directory 2. Run ```npm install``` on command line 3. Run ```npm start``` on command line to run the program. This will run two commands:    - ```tcp```: TypeScript compiler. Creates a JavaScript file from the app.ts -file which Node can easily run    - ```node dist/app.js```. Runs the created JavaScript file with Node
